notes.note: LLM creates XSD-compliant task with context discovery

step.goal: Validate CAPPY 2.0 structure and context system
step.logic: 1 - Check if .cappy/stack.md exists and is not empty 1.1 - If missing or empty, alert user and abort 2 - Verify context orchestration system is ready 2.1 - Check .cappy/index/ directory exists 2.2 - Check docs/ directory structure exists 2.3 - If context system incomplete, suggest running initialization 3 - If structure valid, proceed to next step

step.goal: Ensure no active tasks using XSD status checking
step.logic: 1 - Search .cappy/tasks/ for files with status="in_progress" 2 - Check XSD namespace compliance in existing tasks 2.1 - If non-compliant tasks found, suggest migration 3 - If active task found, inform user and provide task status 3.1 - Suggest completing current task before creating new one 4 - If no active tasks, proceed to context discovery

step.goal: Automatic context discovery based on user description
step.logic: 1 - Collect task description from user in natural language 2 - Extract keywords for context search 3 - Perform context orchestration pipeline: 3.1 - Semantic search in docs/ for related content 3.2 - Infer category based on description patterns: - auth/login/jwt â†’ category="auth" - database/sql/migration â†’ category="database" - api/endpoint/route â†’ category="api" - component/ui/frontend â†’ category="ui" - test/spec/coverage â†’ category="testing" - bug/fix/error â†’ category="bugfix" - refactor/cleanup â†’ category="refactor" - default â†’ category="feature" 3.3 - Find prevention rules by inferred category 3.4 - Search for related tasks by context similarity 3.5 - Extract dependencies from stack.md 4 - Present context discovery summary to user 5 - If context insufficient, ask 1-on-1 questions to clarify 6 - Proceed to scope validation

step.goal: Validate atomic scope with expert analysis
step.logic: 1 - Act as systems analyst expert 2 - Analyze task scope for atomicity (â‰¤5 main steps) 3 - Check for subjectivity and ambiguity 4 - Verify clear validation criteria can be defined 5 - Apply time estimation based on complexity 6 - If scope too large: 6.1 - Suggest task decomposition 6.2 - Propose breaking into smaller atomic tasks 7 - If scope atomic and clear, proceed to XSD generation 8 - Ensure measurable completion criteria defined

step.goal: Generate XSD-compliant task template with context injection
Create XSD task file with context injection

discovery_pipeline.keyword_extraction: Extract nouns, verbs, and domain terms from user description
discovery_pipeline.semantic_search: Find relevant docs using TF-IDF and similarity matching
discovery_pipeline.rule_application: Apply prevention rules by category and severity
discovery_pipeline.task_similarity: Find related tasks by keyword overlap and category
